data.name: Legend of Keepers: Soul Smugglers
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes:

  • Skeleton Lord master
  • 5 missions
  • New promotion: the Graveyard, allowing you to bring monsters back to life in various ways
  • Exclusive game mechanics: Soul Fragments that can be stolen from heroes to upgrade monsters and promotion
  • 10 Psychopomp monsters
  • 3 traps
  • 5 artefacts
data.about_the_game:
This DLC includes:

  • Skeleton Lord master
  • 5 missions
  • New promotion: the Graveyard, allowing you to bring monsters back to life in various ways
  • Exclusive game mechanics: Soul Fragments that can be stolen from heroes to upgrade monsters and promotion
  • 10 Psychopomp monsters
  • 3 traps
  • 5 artefacts
data.short_description: Including new master, new monsters, new game mechanics and more!

fullgame.name: Legend of Keepers: Career of a Dungeon Manager

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Czech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: OS X 10.9.1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Game developed and published by Goblinz Studio SAS (France).
